import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products = [ { name: "Product 1", image: "path/to/image1.png", price: 10, property: "property1", manufacturer: "manufacturer1", }, { name: "Product 2", image: "path/to/image2.png", price: 20, property: "property2", manufacturer: "manufacturer2", }, { name: "Product 3", image: "path/to/image3.png", price: 30, property: "property3", manufacturer: "manufacturer3", }, { name: "Product 4", image: "path/to/image4.png", price: 40, property: "property1", manufacturer: "manufacturer1", }, { name: "Product 5", image: "path/to/image5.png", price: 50, property: "property2", manufacturer: "manufacturer2", }, { name: "Product 6", image: "path/to/image6.png", price: 60, property: "property3", manufacturer: "manufacturer3", }, { name: "Product 7", image: "path/to/image7.png", price: 70, property: "property1", manufacturer: "manufacturer1", }, { name: "Product 8", image: "path/to/image8.png", price: 80, property: "property2", manufacturer: "manufacturer2", }, ]; }
